episode_summary: This episode covers a range of topics including Ted Cruz's awkward campaign moments, the vast undiscovered biodiversity on Earth, Leicester City's owners winning the World Elephant Polo Championships, and Britain's first robot designed to replace the Duke of York.

facts.fact: The first thing that Ted Cruz did after dropping out of the Republican contest was elbow his wife in the face.
This week scientists have discovered that we still haven't discovered 99.99% of life on Earth.
As well as winning the Premier League title, the owners of Leicester City also won the World Elephant Polo Championships.
Britain's first ever robot was designed to replace the Duke of York.
